attributes.action: Use this effective list of crack-down procedures on street gangs to reduce overall crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Force all youths under the age of 18 years to their home after the time of 9pm Summer-time and 7pm Winter-time.

2. Perform on the spot searches of anyone at any age regardless of what they are doing and give no reson for doing so.

3. Have the right to detain youth's if they seem in anyway suspicious and/or refuse to give details.

4. ERASE the Human Right Act 1998 (c.42) immediately as criminals use this to soften the law.

5. Recruit more Police Officers and Community Support Officers nationwide.

6. Give Community Support Officers more power.

7. Have more Police Officers patrolling the streets.

8. Longer sentences in prison.

9. A public vote to decide whether the Death Penalty should be revived in Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
